lender.name: timothy
lender.loan_because: I want to help small business operations in Africa succeed. It takes money to make money, and I'm honored to help make that happen in Senegal where I currently live.
lender.occupational_info: I am a school teacher.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: God, the Father of all people, calls us to love our neighbors as ourselves, and Jesus, God's Son, calls us to love one another as he loves us. Love must be action, not just words. We love because He first loved us!
lender.occupational_info: Helping people discover and live the abundant life God wants to give everyone in this world!

lender.name: Nate & Andrea
lender.loan_because: I love helping others.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: I want to help people be all they can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired teacher

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: As an American, I realize we have so much that we could share with the world. A small amount of our money can make a huge difference for someone. If I can help to make that difference, then the world's economic stability can be improved.
lender.occupational_info: Investing for philanthropic purposes that benefit the arts, religion, women's issues and children.

lender.name: Larsen
lender.loan_because: True happiness is derived from helping others. My loans are given in honor of my grandchildren and great-grandchildren.

lender.name: Ernest
lender.loan_because: If you give someone a fish, they eat for the day. But if you teach and support someone to fish, they can eat and feed dose around them for a life time.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy, sell or rent real estate.

lender.name: Mark & Leanne
lender.loan_because: Jesus teaches us to help the poor, the widows, and the fatherless. We are blessed and blessing others this way is being obedient to God.
lender.occupational_info: I build in a water related industry. I also build rain water collection tanks and systems for my customers in the US.

lender.name: Mark and Katrina
lender.occupation: Fire Fighter and Mary Kay Ind. Beauty Consultant
lender.loan_because: We are excited about the opportunity to help fight poverty through empowering people to rise up and effect change in their life through work. We believe we are blessed to be a blessing... we want to be wise stewards of what God has entrusted to us so we are seeking more ways to pass on His blessings. How much more exciting does it get than that?! What a privilege and an honor!

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Aaron & Ginger
lender.loan_because: Christ paid the ultimate price!

lender.name: Arch & Allison
lender.loan_because: Matthew 22:37-40

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I do

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me, I want to show his love in a tangible way
lender.occupational_info: I help my customers design packaging

lender.name: Shalom & Ria
lender.loan_because:
I love effectiveness and efficiency. The fact that little amounts of money could change lives directly really intrigues me. The concept of no amounts too small to help someone is amazing! Also knowing that what you are giving is not just temporary solution, but a lifechanging one is really cool.
Always loved the quote "Give a Man a Fish, Feed Him For a Day. Teach a Man to Fish, Feed Him For a Lifetime"
There is a sense of accountability in what we are offering... I love that!
lender.occupational_info: I work in many small businesses office. Typically helping and being an apprentice/understudy to a successful entrepreneur.

lender.name: Joy and Michael
lender.loan_because: I (Michael) saw a presentation given by the founder at a Leadership conference, and I got excited about this idea and the impact it can have. And I (Joy) heard about Kiva through a fund development class I took. Love the idea of giving directly to people/entrepeneurs!
lender.occupational_info: Michael is an actor and songwriter and playwright. Joy is a theater director and teacher.

lender.name: Chelsea
lender.loan_because: no matter how small the effort, the ability to help can make a difference.

lender.name: Linaka
lender.loan_because: We are all one. For much of our shared human history, money has been a barrier between people, families, communities and countries and for far too long. With Kiva, we can use the energy of money appropriately ... to bring us together.
lender.occupational_info: Many in the modern world are lost with no one to talk with, no one to help. Counseling is a way of talking and playing and working with the lost so they come back to themselves, find their strength and courage, and make their lives work with Joy.

lender.name: Sabine
lender.loan_because: My life is very comfortable and I want to give people the opportunity to make their lives comfortable too.
lender.occupational_info: In my job I'm responsible for the whole area of human resources: job advertisement, interviews with job candidates, contracts, salary paymen, trainings etc.

lender.name: Ralph
lender.loan_because: Want to help poor develop into successful business.

lender.name: Solomon Family
lender.loan_because: We have helping as a core value of our family, Gods love for us is unconditional. I would rather lend where the money gains interest which empowers us to lend more. This money is always relended. Our small seed with other small seeds can reap an awesome harvest!
lender.occupational_info: Software sales

lender.name: Steinar
lender.loan_because: I can help people who really want to do something with their poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work with retarded persons who need help 24/7.

lender.name: Oliver
lender.occupational_info: I have been working like a dog.

lender.name: SHAPE International
lender.loan_because: We want to enable people to build and grow their businesses to support themselves, their families, their churches and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: We are a family that is interested in helping others with the finances God has blessed us with.

lender.name: Clark
lender.loan_because: I believe lasting social change comes about when diverse people come together to support each other.
lender.occupational_info: I am a social worker and social entrepreneur with a deep commitment to aiding children and families.

lender.name: Breena
lender.occupational_info: I directly care for adults with disabilities that affect their everyday life.

lender.name: Russ
lender.loan_because: I have been given much and Christ compels me to love others.
lender.occupational_info: I pastor a wonderful church called Bridgeway Christian Church in Rocklin, CA

lender.name: painPRO
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to help others help themselves, their families, and their community. Kinda like a "Pay it Forward" approach. We give a percentage of our massage clinics net revenue to this cause in an effort to help create an environment where we can all share and experience Abundance!!!
lender.occupational_info: We help others by relieving pain through advanced Therapeutic Massage Therapy, Exercise Re-Hab, and Orthomolecular Nutrition. The intention is to provide our clients improved health and a better quality of life.

lender.name: Bernard
lender.loan_because: The concept is great!

lender.name: Andrea and Tielman
lender.loan_because:
Matthew 25:40 " 31"When the Son of Man comes in his glory, and all the angels with him, he will sit on his throne in heavenly glory. 32All the nations will be gathered before him, and he will separate the people one from another as a shepherd separates the sheep from the goats. 33He will put the sheep on his right and the goats on his left. 34"Then the King will say to those on his right, 'Come, you who are blessed by my Father; take your inheritance, the kingdom prepared for you since the creation of the world. 35For I was hungry and you gave me something to eat, I was thirsty and you gave me something to drink, I was a stranger and you invited me in, 36I needed clothes and you clothed me, I was sick and you looked after me, I was in prison and you came to visit me.'
37"Then the righteous will answer him, 'Lord, when did we see you hungry and feed you, or thirsty and give you something to drink? 38When did we see you a stranger and invite you in, or needing clothes and clothe you? 39When did we see you sick or in prison and go to visit you?'
40"The King will reply, 'I tell you the truth, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers of mine, you did for me.'
41"Then he will say to those on his left, 'Depart from me, you who are cursed, into the eternal fire prepared for the devil and his angels. 42For I was hungry and you gave me nothing to eat, I was thirsty and you gave me nothing to drink, 43I was a stranger and you did not invite me in, I needed clothes and you did not clothe me, I was sick and in prison and you did not look after me.'
My thoughts: I haven't chosen to give loans because I want to get into heaven, that's not what I am saying, because I believe that Jesus told the truth when he said that we are "saved by grace through faith, and not by works." But, if it is important to God to take care of my neighbor, it is important to me. Besides, I think he's hardwired it in me. I have noticed that most every person I know has had success because someone, somehow, helped them achieve it. I had no control over being born into a family who had the chance to succeed. (and success is always relative and defined differently)... but I understand the desire to create and to have a sense of accomplishment. I think everyone should have a chance to experience that. I pray that God would bless the entire world through the partners of KIVA. I pray also more specifically for entrepraneurs who struggle daily to educate their kids and feed their families. God bless you.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I draw goofy cartoon portraits of people that visit las vegas. :) Its fun!

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: "From everyone who has been given much, much will be demanded; and from the one who has been entrusted with much, much more will be asked." Luke 12:48

lender.name: Debbi
lender.occupation: Director of Ministries to Children and Families
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed and called to share.

lender.name: Lucy
lender.loan_because: I believe those of us who have so much have a responsibility to help those who don't. This is an innovative way to help others help themselves to become self-sufficient.

lender.name: Sami
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with the means to bless others.
lender.occupational_info: I am in high school. I play the flute, and I love my Savior Jesus Christ.

lender.name: Dr James and Katie
lender.loan_because: It makes people smile!
lender.occupational_info: Cheif Smile Officer Cosmetic Dentist

lender.name: Diana
lender.occupational_info: I create mixed media art pieces that speak about the soul and inspire you to think and create. It's my mission in life to inspire others to create and make art from their soul. I'm currently working on a book and a collection of art to be exhibited.

lender.name: Rialto High School
lender.loan_because: We want to stop poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Students and teachers at Rialto High School

lender.name: Esteban
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. My parents were immigrants to the US in the 1960's and I've been lucky enough to enjoy the opportunities the US has to offer...I respect their entrepreneurial spirit and want to help them realize their dream.
lender.occupational_info: I work in high tech here in San Francisco.

lender.name: kimberlei
lender.loan_because: It seems like the right thing to do. I have met a friend in Africa and he is here in the US for now. I want to help someone in his community.
lender.occupational_info: In the US you have to have an insurance policy on your car so you can legally drive it. When you get into an accident with your car, alone or with someone else. The insurance is there to help you pay for any repairs that are needed so you don't lose your car and can't afford to repair it. I inspect the damaged cars and pay for the repairs.

lender.name: Julius
lender.loan_because: I love people.
lender.occupational_info: Making sure when people work to support their family, they are working in a safe environment.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I want to help ambitious people around the wordl
lender.occupational_info: I am a homemaker. Married for 57 years. Now retired from working out of the home.

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: It is what Pastafarians do

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I admire the recipient's determination, energy, and strength.
lender.occupational_info: I analyze needs and problems for businesses and help them to identify worthwhile solutions.

lender.name: Jeffrey Turpin
lender.loan_because:
Jesus said to care for the "least of these," those who are poor being one of them. While Christians are called to help the poor, we must understand that the poor are never released from poverty simply through handouts, but by becoming educated and industrious, creating a market, and taking responsibility for their lives upon themselves. Such are the only methods for being able to overcome the obstacles without succumbing to them shortly thereafter.
Kiva is an amazing tool to help people who are willing to help themselves able to help themselves. It is with hope that I wish families, neighborhoods, and even countries can be lifted out of poverty.
Micah 6:8: "Do justice, love kindness, and walk humbly with your God."
lender.occupational_info: I'm not sure how to explain the concept of essentially being a software engineer. Such would assume knowing what computers are and having a general understanding of the business world. Still, my job is to automate processes that a business needs to do to make money so that it does not have to be done manually by people. It is exponentially more efficient.

lender.name: Chris
lender.occupational_info: I am a worship pastor in Keizer, Oregon.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of the human spirit. When we work together, we can change the world!

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: I believe those who have more than enough should help those who are under resourced.
lender.occupational_info: I pastor a church and try to help people find significance in their lives.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: As a small business owner myself I know how a little capital can go a long way. I am also aware that I live in a land of plenty and seek to create balance in my life by helping others in less fortunate countries.
lender.occupational_info: I create inspirational stained glass to enrich peoples' homes and lives...inspiration can come from many sources. My personal inspiration is, and always will be, the sea.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I want to give back. I've been blessed in my life and want to acknowledge that by helping others.

lender.name: Vince
lender.loan_because: Its one way to share the love of Jesus Christ with others, God has been very good to me and I want to be good to others in his name.
lender.occupational_info: I am a general manager in a very large retail company.

lender.name: Christina
lender.occupation: Owner Operator of West Side Skate Shop

lender.name: Maurice
lender.loan_because: I want to bless others with what God has so bountifully blessed me with.
lender.occupational_info: I teach middle school school studies & history

lender.name: eric
lender.loan_because: I started a business on three credit cards and thought only in America could this happen and now I know I was wrong through KIVA all things are possible
lender.occupational_info: I work with video

lender.name: Sandi
lender.loan_because: Kiva allows me to put funds into the hands of entrepreneurs who will continue to earn an income and stimulate their countries economy. When the loan is repaid I just pass it on to another entrepreneur.

lender.name: Protorial
lender.loan_because: Users of the Protorial blog compel me to do so
lender.occupational_info: Inspirational blogger

lender.name: Dale W.
lender.loan_because: I can only say that it just feels good to help out others to reach their goals.

lender.name: Candyce
lender.loan_because: sometimes people just need a jump start to fulfill their potential. I would want someone to do the same for me.

lender.name: Jeff & Joyce
lender.loan_because: God loaned first....
lender.occupational_info: Owner/Operator of a Local Residential Remodeling Company. Associate Professor in Business & Economics at Bethel University

lender.name: Barb
lender.loan_because: I have been inspired to help others succeed in their dreams and because God has blessed me.
lender.occupational_info: I support a wonderful team of laboratory chemists by doing office work for them. My responsibilities include compiling reports, processing payments, and ordering supplies.

lender.name: paula
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with the ability and means to bless others!

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: What is mine is also yours.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a local hospital taking care of mothers and their new babies.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: I'm a sucker for sustainable empowerment!

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: Sometimes a little help goes a long way.

lender.name: Simeon
lender.loan_because: 1. This is a life experience. 2. We have to make our step to make this world a more trustable place. 3. This is just a way to create happiness.
lender.occupational_info: I am doing reasearch in infrared detectors based on novel semiconductor materials. These devices can apply, among other arease, to medicine, astronomy, civil safety, military, food quality control.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: To those who much has been given....much is expected.
lender.occupational_info: Create optimized selling teams

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: When we all have a chance to be entrepreneurial, we all benefit.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that helps kids.

lender.name: Jordanna
lender.loan_because: it feels good inside :)
lender.occupational_info: I run a day care out of my house. I am state licensed and monitored, and have rules to adhere to. I am allowed to watch six children at a time, newborn to five years old. I really enjoy my job, the children are great. It is rewarding. I also work part time at a restaurant on the weekends, as a waitress and bartender. The restaurant is fast paced and is good exercise, and doubles as my social life. :)

lender.name: Glen
lender.loan_because: Creo que si Puedo entonces debo, y en este momentito puedo.
lender.occupational_info: Profesor de la lengua inglesa

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: The stories of these entrepreneurs are touching. If I can help make any amount of difference I will be very happy!
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Tax Accountant for an international accounting firm.

lender.name: Fiona
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Stan
lender.loan_because: Kiva is an awesome way to help people help themselves!
lender.occupational_info: I operate computers.

lender.name: Daisy & Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I care...

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English!

lender.name: Amy Rooney
lender.loan_because: I see microfinance as the best way of helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital with patients who have lung disease and heart problems.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because:
Jesus said, "Lay not up for yourselves treasures upon earth, where moth and rust doth corrupt, and where thieves break through and steal: But lay up for yourselves treasures in heaven, where neither moth nor rust doth corrupt, and where thieves do not break through nor steal: For where your treasure is, there will your heart be also." (Matthew 6:19-21)
AND
"Then shall the King say unto them on his right hand, Come, ye blessed of my Father, inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world: For I was an hungred, and ye gave me meat: I was thirsty, and ye gave me drink: I was a stranger, and ye took me in: Naked, and ye clothed me: I was sick, and ye visited me: I was in prison, and ye came unto me. Then shall the righteous answer him, saying, Lord, when saw we thee an hungred, and fed thee? or thirsty, and gave thee drink? When saw we thee a stranger, and took thee in? or naked, and clothed thee? Or when saw we thee sick, or in prison, and came unto thee? And the King shall answer and say unto them, Verily I say unto you, Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren, ye have done it unto me." (Matthew 25:34-40)
lender.occupational_info: Walking in the love and power of God.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me and I want to bless others. :)

lender.name: Lois
lender.loan_because: "Let Go and let God"!!!
lender.occupational_info: my greatest calling

lender.name: Venus
lender.loan_because:
I love helping people. One day I'll be able to do MORE... but I've faced many financial challenges myself. The loans I give will go back out to those in need once repaid.
I hope to be a blessing to those I help. Thank you, Your earthangel, "Venus" :-)

lender.name: masataka
lender.loan_because: accelerating social change

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I was fortunate to be born and raised in a country (Scotland) where I received a good education which has allowed me to lead a full, interesting life. I am a member of the Unitarian Universalist Fellowship of Paris a group dedicated to helping those less fortunate than ourselves by donating money collected from our congregation to various international causes.
lender.occupational_info: I retired recently as a translator from French to English for an international company based in France. my work involved translating technical documents, newsletters, an architectural magazine, etc. I love translating and hope to continue working in this field.

lender.name: Andreas
lender.loan_because: "You`ll never walk alone"

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I know it's not easy being an entrepreneur
lender.occupational_info: Teaching people how to wear their children and selling baby wraps

lender.name: Lily
lender.loan_because: I would like the world to move closer to equality.
lender.occupational_info: Sim City in real life; managers and mediators of natural resources, the built environment and communities.

lender.name: Jan Ole
lender.loan_because: I would like to offer an opportunity
lender.occupational_info: I am regional manager of Junior Achivement (an entreprenouriell organisation) in southern Norway.

lender.name: Victor
lender.loan_because: With a little and modest contribution - we can make the big difference and get a huge satisfaction.

lender.name: Terri & Keith
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us and we want to help others
lender.occupational_info: Keith is a Software Engineer creating mobile software applications. Terri is a Software Quality Tester and ensures that Keith does it right.

lender.name: Lucy
lender.loan_because: I like thinking that I'm making a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school student, and I love to draw, paint, play music, and write. I visited Urubamba, Peru this past summer with VISIONS Service Adventures.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: I worked in Bolivia and learned to love the world. My experiences there have enlightened me and taught me a new meaning of the term "neighbor" as used by Jesus Christ.
lender.occupational_info: I am a vegitable farmer.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: it feels good to know that, along with others, I am making a big difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a university in a department that helps new students start their education.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I have the desire to help others if I can. I have spent time in Senegal and my eyes were openned to the many needs.

lender.name: Max
lender.loan_because: I Care
lender.occupational_info: I bring true & honest news to anybody who is interested in it.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: I love Kenya and Naivasha holds a special place in my heart.
lender.occupational_info: I help to develop the specialized computer systems that deliver satellite and cable television.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: my money will be put to better use by someone who needs it

lender.name: Rita Alfonso
lender.loan_because: I believe in TIKKUN: to heal, to repair, to help transform the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer of short stories and a painter of small water colours. I am interested in people's stories. I appreciate hearing them. They inspire my writing and my art.

lender.name: Jane Alice Strand
lender.loan_because: I like to help when I can.
lender.occupational_info:
I work with IT Management within projects in the oil business. I also work with marketing of Arts, local artists in my community.
As a hobby I work to help people around the world earning extra cash on the Internet, and some of my earnings go to helping people in KIVA.

lender.name: robyn
lender.loan_because: I believe we can change the world, one small action at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I am a knitter - I knit items that are sent around the world to help keep the poorest of the poor just a little bit warmer.

lender.occupational_info: Teacher of Geography at a seconday school in Glasgow

lender.name: Ingrid
lender.loan_because: I hope it works

lender.name: MDJ
lender.loan_because: I want to promote the empowerment of economic independence.

lender.name: Leah
lender.loan_because: It is a good thing to do to help people start a business, keep a business, or help their family to keep their lives on track.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in a public school.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because:
I want to share my blessings to make a difference in the lives of others who have. Not had the oppotunities I have.
The Bible direct us to Love our neighbor. I feel this is a way to do that.
lender.occupational_info: I help people build their wealth and achieve their goals. I show them how to make their hard earned money work for them.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I want to help make change in the world by helping people help themselves

lender.name: Huckleberry
lender.loan_because: We are called to give to others...to help the poor, widows and orphans.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to be more effective in their work and life using software that my company has designed.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: I received money from the community in which my grandma lived in remembrance of her passing on July 12, 2009. I have chosen to lend this money to others in honor of her.

lender.name: Carmen Yasmin
lender.loan_because: I can do it.

lender.name: Innis family
lender.loan_because: We are one.
lender.occupational_info: Helping others achieve their goals.

lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be in a position to be able to.

lender.name: Jacob C.
lender.loan_because: I Enjoy Changing The World In Small Ways
lender.occupational_info: I Help Create and Maintain A Website For A Christian Non-Profit Organization Called God's Great Outdoors. They Try To Help Outdoorsmen Recieve The Light Of Christ In Their Field. I also run my own website all about modern/endtimes Christianity. www.wwjdwjc.com Visit Them At...

lender.name: Myra
lender.loan_because: little steps can make a big difference.

lender.name: Rikke
lender.occupational_info: I study to become a social worker i Denmark

lender.name: Abigail
lender.loan_because: It's exciting to help people who want to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I plan events for girls, helping them to become leaders and make the world a better place.

lender.name: Grant
lender.loan_because: I want to be a part of what Kiva is trying to do. Help empower people to lift themselves out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I create media for a local church to help translate our message in a way people in the real world today can understand it.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I love others and have been blessed personally.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way to make a difference. Everyone deserves an opportunity to thrive.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: Jesus has blessed me and I want to share His love by helping others.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I want to help those in poverty to feel the love God has for them and know that people from around the world not only love, care, and pray for them, but want to help them too.
lender.occupational_info: I work in children's ministry to help give children an opportunity to invite Jesus into their lives and have a growing personal relationship with him.

lender.name: Palomas Nest
lender.loan_because: We believe in sharing the opportunity we have had as business owners with other entrepreneurs around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Paloma's Nest produces hand crafted modern heirlooms; gifts and home furnishings to be passed on to future generations.

lender.name: Dena
lender.loan_because: I want to help empower people who may have trouble getting help the conventional ways.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I can. That is a good enough reason.
lender.occupational_info: I create software that enables people to make TV programs and films.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to help others support themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I lend money to help doctors buy equipment and grow their medical practice.

lender.name: Wins
lender.loan_because: I want to empower others.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: Where much is given, much is expected
lender.occupational_info: I teach people to solve technical and business problems in a way that makes a positive impact to the bottom line and to the people around them.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: It's obvious – I've got some money, they need it; it doesn't hurt to lend and those who get the money will be able to build somthing out of it.

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: I loan because it’s something that helps directly. The concept of Kiva is unique.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a network architect. It is system design, configuration and installation for computer infrastructure including firewalls. I am also an indie writer of existential novels.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others, in the way that others have helped me.
lender.occupational_info: I am enthusiastically pursuing self-knowledge and personal freedom in my life, as best as I know how.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: Since God is my provider and everything I own is His - I choose to help even in this small way.

lender.name: leon
lender.loan_because: it is inspiring to see people motivated to create opportunities for themselves.

lender.name: Stephen Stoltenberg
lender.loan_because: I understand how difficult it can be to start a business and how hard it is to keep one running. I am currently working on opening my own.
lender.occupational_info: I work on computers for my mom's company. Soon I will have my own company and be working to keep the planet cleaner by selling and installing solar powered products, as well as installing solar panels.

lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at Pacific Buddhist Academy High school, in Honolulu, Hawaii.

lender.name: Keith & Jessica
lender.loan_because: My wife and I feel this is one way that God works through others to help people in need. For us, it is humbling to have been a part of another persons' success.
lender.occupational_info: We do God's work...the best way we know how.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: Thoreau said, "Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined." This is a statement I try to live by and there is no greater joy than helping others live the life they have imagined.
lender.occupational_info: I work with music and the creative arts in a non-denominational church as well volunteer in community theatre in a variety of on-stage and off-stage roles.

lender.name: Seraphic
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Meredith
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work in higher education, with Christian colleges and universities. I plan and organize events for the schools.

lender.name: Kudakwashe
lender.loan_because: I am passionate about micro-finance because it gives others a chance to have a better life. Many impoverished people across the world have good entrepreneurial ideas but they do not have the resources to turn their ideas into a business. Lending enables them to make their dream come true. Coming from Zimbabwe, I am aware of extreme poverty and how a soft loan can change the situation. I loan because I want to be an agent of change.
lender.occupational_info: I just started lending. As a student, I don't have much time to work on lending projects. At the moment, I take part in many community service projects. However, I intend to work in the micro-finance industry when I graduate.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: A small loan from me can make a big difference to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I work on computers for schools in Washington State.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I believe in others. It gives others opportunities to work for a new life that they otherwise might not have. So much more could be built in this world and will be built...
lender.occupational_info: I restore and rebuild buildings that have experienced disaster such as fires, floods, or ant other. I am a freelance photographer and I am also launching a t-shirt company.

lender.occupational_info: I work in my beauty Salon doing nails (fingernails) to make them beautiful for people who come to me. I also sell a wickless candle through a company called "Scentsy"

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I believe that we have to provide opportunities for people to help themselves, through their own solutions rather than imposing our own ideas and ideologies on them. Haven't we all needed a hand up some time? I'm glad to extend my hand of support.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an environmental education charity in the United Kingdom. We give people the chance to spend time in wild places, away from all the normal daily pressures and distractions, so that they can discover who they are and what they really want. We hope that having spent time in nature, people value the last of the world's wild places and want to save them from being developed or destroyed.

lender.name: Zachary
lender.loan_because: I feel like it is doing good and I don't think the big banks take the time to make such loans.
lender.occupational_info: I love meeting new people and trying to communicate across cultural norms.
